name: Renovate
description: Keep npm dependencies up-to-date with Pull Requests

RENOVATE_REPOS.description: Comma-separated list of repositories, e.g. singapore/repo1,singapore/repo2 (no spaces)

RENOVATE_PACKAGE_FILES.description: Comma-separated list of package file paths to renovate (no spaces)

RENOVATE_DEP_TYPES.description: Comma-separated list of dependency types (no spaces)

RENOVATE_IGNORE_DEPS.description: Comma-separated list of dependency names to ignore (no spaces)

RENOVATE_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of labels to add to new Pull Requests (no spaces)

RENOVATE_FORCE.description: Force creation of new PRs even if matching closed ones exist
